name: EPIPHYTE
description:
Created for the GMTK 2021 Gamejam - "Joined Together"

EPIPHYTE is a game about growing together! Link up with your epiphyte seedling and protect them throughout the VINE as dangers lurk to take you out and steal your great clam bounty!

Ran out of time for a Tutorial and proper room transitions :/

Controls:

Move up: Up Arrow (or) "W"-key

Move down: Down Arrow (or) "S"-key

Special Ability: Hot Key 1
